migrate_monday_import_desc: When you migrate from Monday.com to JustDo, we automatically bring over:
migrate_monday_core_data_items: All items (tasks) with their hierarchical structure
migrate_monday_core_data_dates: Creation dates and last updated timestamps
migrate_monday_fields_status: Status columns with labels and colors
migrate_monday_user_board: Board member lists (to be configured as JustDo members)
migrate_monday_process_desc: The migration is fully automated and requires minimal effort from your team:
migrate_monday_process_step3: Monitor & Validate - Track progress and confirm that data has transferred correctly
migrate_monday_process_note: No data mapping, no manual exports, no complex configurations required.
migrate_monday_timeline_desc: The migration run time depends on your data volume - anywhere from about a minute to a few hours.
migrate_monday_timeline_data: The amount of data in your Monday.com workspace
migrate_monday_support_desc: Our dedicated enterprise migration team provides:
migrate_monday_support_consult: Pre-Migration Consultation: Review your current structure and plan the optimal migration strategy
migrate_monday_support_mapping: Custom Field Mapping: Assistance with complex field types and custom requirements
migrate_monday_support_access: Access Control Configuration: Help setting up your permission structure
migrate_monday_support_validation: Data Validation: Comprehensive verification that all data transferred correctly
migrate_monday_support_training: Training Sessions: Custom training for administrators and end-users
migrate_monday_support_ongoing: Ongoing Support: Post-migration support to ensure smooth operations
migrate_monday_cta: Ready to get started? Contact our enterprise migration team at info@justdo.com to schedule your consultation and begin your seamless transition to JustDo.
